inclusion.criterion: complete microscopic excision of primary tumour and stage II
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: surgery, stage I or IV disease
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: past history of malignancy except basal cell skin cancer
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has breast cancer with post mastectomy and complete microscopic excision of primary tumour and stage II. No past history of malignancy except basal cell skin cancer.
